meanings.definition: A person or thing that veils something.
meanings.sent1: The veilers at the wedding made the bride look even more beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The veilers in the theater added an air of mystery to the performance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous veilers played hide-and-seek with the curtains.
meanings.sent4: The fog acted like a veiler, shrouding the city in secrecy.
meanings.sent5: The veilers on the windows softened the harsh sunlight into a gentle glow.
